__e: He says he's with Trish now, and you're crazy.
He showed me pictures of Trish and Sam, told me what he'll do to them if I didn't...
You think because we hang out with Jack and Trish every now and then... they're our friends? .
When Trish turned on the light, it wasn't a man, it was you, little one.
I don't want to disappoint you, but I'm not going to propose to you on the same day Trish lost her father.
Then, after trish's dad was killed, I got the same call again.
